languages.text:
Не забывайте повышать уровень персонажа и спутников — с развитием они получают новые способности и таланты, а также развивают навыки и характеристики.
Нажмите на изображение стрелок на портрете, чтобы перейти к окну повышения.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.
languages.original_text:
Не забывайте повышать уровень персонажа и спутников — с развитием они получают новые способности и таланты, а также развивают навыки и характеристики.
Нажмите на изображение стрелок на портрете, чтобы перейти к окну повышения.

traits.locale_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the level up screen.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the level up screen.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the level up screen.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

languages.text:
别忘了提高您的角色与伙伴的等级，升级可以解锁新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，同时提高{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值与各种属性。
点击角色头像上的箭头符号，即可打开{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}界面。
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

traits.locale_text:
别忘了提高您的角色与伙伴的等级，升级可以解锁新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与新的{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，同时提高{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值与各种属性。
点击角色头像上的箭头符号，即可打开{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}界面。

languages.text:
キャラクターとその仲間のレベルを上げることを忘れないようにしよう。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}と特性を向上させることができる。
キャラクターのポートレートの矢印マークをクリックすると、{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}画面が開く。
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

traits.locale_text:
キャラクターとその仲間のレベルを上げることを忘れないようにしよう。新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}と特性を向上させることができる。
キャラクターのポートレートの矢印記号をクリックすると、{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}画面が開く。

languages.text:
No te olvides de potenciar el nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros. Todos ellos reciben nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} constantemente, además de mejorar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y características.
Haz clic en el símbolo de las flechas sobre el retrato de un personaje para abrir la pantalla de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Subir de nivel{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

traits.locale_text:
No te olvides de potenciar el nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros. Todos ellos reciben nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} constantemente, además de mejorar sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y características.
Haz clic en el símbolo de las flechas sobre el retrato de un personaje para abrir la pantalla de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Subir de nivel{/g}.

languages.text:
Denke daran, die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Begleiter zu erhöhen. Sie erhalten ständig neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und verbessern ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} und Eigenschaften.
Klicke auf das Pfeilsymbol auf dem Porträt eines Charakters, um den {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstiegsbildschirm{/g} aufzurufen.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

traits.locale_text:
Denke daran, die Stufe deines Charakters und seiner Begleiter zu erhöhen — sie erhalten immer neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und verbessern ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} und Eigenschaften.
Klicke auf das Pfeilsymbol auf dem Porträt eines Charakters, um den {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstiegsbildschirm{/g} aufzurufen.

languages.text:
N'oubliez pas de faire progresser le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons. Ils bénéficient continuellement de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, et améliorent leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et caractéristiques.
Cliquez sur le symbole des flèches sur le portrait d'un personnage pour ouvrir l'écran de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}niveau supérieur{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.

traits.locale_text:
N'oubliez pas de faire progresser le niveau de votre personnage et de ses compagnons. Ils bénéficient continuellement de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, et améliorent leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et caractéristiques.
Cliquez sur le symbole des flèches sur le portrait d'un personnage pour ouvrir l'écran de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}niveau supérieur{/g}.

languages.text:
Karakterin ile yoldaşlarına seviye atlatmayı unutma. Kazandıkları her seviye ile beraber yeni {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriler{/g} edinir, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} ve niteliklerini geliştirirler.
Bir karakterin portresindeki ok sembolüne tıklayarak {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}seviye atlama{/g} ekranını açabilirsin.
languages.original_text:
Remember to advance the level of your character and their companions — they always receive new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and improve their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and characteristics.
Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen.
